message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  We can negotiate further if you think it's too much.
Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor. I propose a 55/45 split in your favor as a counter-offer.  This seems fairer given the inflation.
Okay, I understand your point about fairness. I'm willing to compromise, but a 58/42 split feels more balanced considering the inflation we're dealing with. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise. How about a 56/44 split? It's closer to your offer, but still acknowledges the impact of inflation on both of us.
